text: Lyle's the man who thinks ahead.

text: Can't prank a dude who has the balls to pee himself from the getgo.

name: psykeres
text:
The alt text wins this one.
That Lyle is CRAFTY!

...that was the Beastie Boys...

name: greymantledwolf
text: A comment left by greymantledwolf was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, aHatOfPig, miaou)

name: tttt
text: abbreviating 'chinese water torture' like it's just one of those things one should abbreviate

name: charchar
text: I feel it gives Lie-bot some torture cred.

name: idsyen
text: I think he just may have a future in government. Wait, come to think of it Lie Bot was clearly designed for government work.

name: scraggg
text: Thankfully, due to his rampant alcoholism, use of illicit drugs, and the fact that he lives the life of a careless wastrel, Lyle is completely unqualified for public office.

name: invidious
text: Except the Presidency of the United States, evidently.  The only thing missing from Lyle's resume is that he never owned a baseball team.

name: shutup_shutup
text: BURN ON POLITICS.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Lie Bot is a master. Randomly turning a specific term into an acronym is a great way to make it seem like you're more familiar with a subject than you actually are. I've been doing this for years.

I've often done this with my roommate when she asks me a question about something I don't really know that well; but, as soon as I take the topic and make an acronym out of it, in almost the exact way LB does, she'll believe almost anything I say about it.

Try it on a date!

name: aparrish
text: Oh, you mean RTASTIAA?

name: fineoakstructure
text: .....Perfektion

name: i_love_kate
text: Oh, SKMDC.

name: woodenteeth
text:
How often does an Achewood strip have a regular punchline?

Not often.

name: fancyrat
text: Dammit I laughed so hard at this strip that I bent over and whacked the TV/VIDEO button on the remote with my nose and The Matrix disappeared.

name: woodenteeth
text: What did you say?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: somebody already beat them to it.
